original_text:
God has spoken in his holiness:
    “With exultation I will divide up Shechem
    and portion out the Vale of Succoth.
korean_text: 하나님이 그의 거룩하심으로 말씀하시되 내가 뛰놀리라 내가 세겜을 나누며 숙곳 골짜기를 측량하리라

sentences.original_text: God has spoken in his holiness:
With exultation I will divide up Shechem
and portion out the Vale of Succoth.
